content.raw:
I’m using up to date catkin build. When I run:

 `ign launch -v 4 cave_circuit.ign worldName:=simple_cave_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=x3_sensor_config_4 enableGroundTruth:=true`

 as the only ROS process, terminal output shows infinite stream of errors:

```
[ERROR] [1585993970.793966683, 13.608000000]: Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format (input format is: 32FC1)
[ERROR] [1585993970.794205388, 13.608000000]: cv_bridge exception: '[32FC1] is not a color format. but [bgr8] is. The conversion does not make sense'
```

Simulation seems to be responsive when I interact with it. I’m not subscribing to any compressed images. I have OpenCV 4.2 installed alongside of OpenCV 3.x installed by ROS.
content.html:
I’m using up to date catkin build. When I run:

ign launch -v 4 cave_circuit.ign worldName:=simple_cave_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=x3_sensor_config_4 enableGroundTruth:=true

as the only ROS process, terminal output shows infinite stream of errors:

[ERROR] [1585993970.793966683, 13.608000000]: Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format (input format is: 32FC1)
[ERROR] [1585993970.794205388, 13.608000000]: cv_bridge exception: '[32FC1] is not a color format. but [bgr8] is. The conversion does not make sense'

Simulation seems to be responsive when I interact with it. I’m not subscribing to any compressed images. I have OpenCV 4.2 installed alongside of OpenCV 3.x installed by ROS.
